title: Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area: Donate
body: Donate        Alpine environments can be found in the northern area of Bighorn Canyon NPS   Â    You can make a donation to benefit Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area directly to the park. The entire gift will be used for the purpose you identified and no administrative costs will be deducted. The donation is tax deductable.  Make sure to identify what you would like your donation to support:   Educational Programs   Visitor Information   Plant Studies   Animal Studies   Habitat Restoration   Litter Clean-up   Ranger Activities   Volunteer Program   Emergency Medical Supplies   Water Safety   Other - ______________________    Your check will be deposited in a government account and the full amount will be spent as you intended. For security and other reasons, we cannot accept online donations directly to the park. You can send your check to: Superintendent Bighorn Canyon NRA 5 Avenue B Fort Smith, MT 59035  Thank you very much. Your donation makes a difference!
